about.label: About me
about.title: Creativity meets
about.description1: I am a motivated web developer with experience in HTML, CSS and JavaScript. My journey into the world of web development began out of pure curiosity and has developed into a real passion.
about.description2: Born in Moldova, I now live in Germany and bring an international perspective to my work. In my free time, I play volleyball, swim and create websites.
